alert.nip07-unavailable: It seems that NIP-07 is not available.
alert.npub-limitation: You are logged in with npub and unable to create or edit a list.
alert.nsec-and-nip07-info: You can create or edit your lists by logging in with NIP-07 (browser extension) or nsec.

dialog.delete-list-confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this list?

identifier-required: Identifier (required, cannot be changed after creation)
nosli-description: Nosli helps you create a curated list of posts on Nostr that is a open protocol for a decentralized global social network
